title: Chicken, walnut and pomegranate stew with Persian basmati rice
description: This sweet and nutty chicken stew is slow cooked to create a thick, rich sauce. Serve with Persian-style rice for a taste of the Middle East.
ingredients: 8 chicken thighs, bone in and skin removed
600g/1lb 5oz de-shelled walnuts, finely ground in a food processor
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
